Plot: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.
Title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Writer: Susan Estelle Jansen, Ed Decter, John J. Strauss, Terri Minsky (characters)
Actors: Hilary Duff, Adam Lamberg, Hallie Todd, Robert Carradine
tomatoConsensus: Harmless piece of fluff that ought to satisfy fans of the TV show.
